page.title: 01The Saxon Graveyard
page.content: In September 1984 gasmen came to lay pipes under our school field.They found a Saxon graveyard. The archeologists came. They found{21 {graves}but they estimated there were between{60 and 100 graves}under our playing field . The archeologist found a{skeleton }of a man with only a few bones missing. He was{1300}years old.He was buried facing{North-South and all the others were facing {East-West.}We think this is because our Saxon man had a different { {religion. { { { { By Tamsin Lawrence, Isabel {Sabine and Adele Gilbert.}
